title: Merge physical and digital documents ðŸ’»
text: Say goodbye to scattered paperwork and digital clutter by centralizing all your important documents in one secure location. Merge physical files with digital documents to create a comprehensive repository of essential information. Whether it's legal papers, financial records, or medical documents, having everything organized and easily accessible streamlines your life and ensures that you're prepared for whatever comes your way.

section.title: Why Antd?
section.content: Ant Design is a React UI library that has a lot of easy-to-use components for building elegant UI.

section.title: Why styled-components?
section.content: Styled Components gives you total control over your components.
